entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is a journalist who writes for the Daily Prophet. She is mentioned in the context of her article.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as being able to still be gamekeeper despite the changes in Care of Magical Creatures.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is a student who has been cool toward Harry since the ball. She mentions meeting someone from Beauxbatons in Hogsmeade.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a student who is mentioned as being angry about Hagrid's job and having paid too little attention to Parvati at the ball.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is a student who praises Professor Grubbly-Plank's lesson and mentions reading about unicorns in the Daily Prophet article.

entities.name: professor grubbly-plank
entities.description: Professor Grubbly-Plank is a teacher who gives a good lesson on Care of Magical Creatures.

entities.name: beauxbatons
entities.description: Beauxbatons is a school that Parvati mentions meeting someone from in Hogsmeade.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Hogsmeade is a location where Parvati plans to meet someone from Beauxbatons.

relationships.description: Parvati has been cool toward Harry since the ball.
Parvati plans to meet someone from Beauxbatons in Hogsmeade.
Harry defends Hagrid's job as gamekeeper.
